Html:
Hello

I am trying to use the demo windowsforms app .....

As my PC is offline, I have selected "cache only".

I have seen that "data.gmdb" file contains tiles from Vilnius (in App Data folder), so I have selected lat 54.696059 lon 25.263748. Tile seem to be OSM tiles (Mapnik), so I select "OpenStreetMap". I have selected grid, so X=145,Y=81 (for zoom 8) is displayed.

And I make "Go To", but I only get blue tiles "No data in local tile cache" !

What is wrong ?
no data in cache or you use ServerMode
